name: Mistakes (Misticloud)
description:
Every soul lefts the body by leaving the past life behind. But do regrets, mistakes and memories perish from the soul?

This is a short bullet hell game made in under 2 days for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.

Controls

Arrow keys - movement
Z - interact
X - shoot

Credits

Misticloud - Director | Coder | Pixel Artist | Musician

Resources used:

  • Nocturne Op. 55 No. 1 (Ending song)
  • Freessound.org (For sound effects)
